item.title: prettypublisher
item.description: R package to help in formatting R markdown documents into a publishable format. The source code is available on here

item.title: tbinenglanddataclean
item.description: R package containing the scripts required to clean data from the Enhanced Tuberculosis Surveillance system, and the Labour Force Survey, and to then calculate Tuberculosis incidence. The source code is available here
